snippet: A Bureau of Reclamation report expected this week includes a potentially contentious idea to build a pipeline and export water from the Missouri River to ease demand on the depleted Colorado River.
abstract: Bureau of Reclamation is expected to release proposal, in effort to enhance diminishing flow of Colorado River, that offers traditional solutions to water shortages but also more contentious approach to build a pipeline from Missouri River to Denver; Colorado River basin has long struggled to keep seven states and some 25 million people hydrated.
lead_paragraph: A Bureau of Reclamation report expected this week includes a potentially contentious idea to build a pipeline and export water from the Missouri River to ease demand on the depleted Colorado River.

headline.seo: Water Piped West to Denver Could Ease Stress on Colo. River
headline.main: Water Piped to Denver Could Ease Stress on River
headline.print_headline: Water Piped to Denver Could Ease Stress on River
